info.title: Genie transaction enrichment API
info.description:
Applications that use Akahu for bank account connectivity can use our transactions API to get high quality enriched transactions that include merchant and category information. We've built the Genie API to expose Akahu's transaction enrichment engine for applications that instead source raw transaction data themselves.

Genie is entirely separate from the core Akahu API and does not require an Akahu App ID Token or App Secret to access. If you're keen to get your hands on an API key to try it out, get in touch with us at hello@akahu.nz.

GenieCategory.description: A category classification result from Genie. This classification provides the base [NZFCC](https://nzfcc.org) category code for the transaction. Additionally, the `groups` attribute includes a mapping of the NZFCC category into broader (less-specific) category groups. Category grouping is based on mappings which are able to be customised per-client. The `personal_finance` mapping is included by default.

_id.description: The [NZFCC](https://nzfcc.org) category code for the transaction

name.description: The name of the NZFCC category for this transaction

groups.description: A dictionary of category groups, keyed by category mapping name, for the NZFCC base category.

_id.description: The category group ID for this mapping.

name.description: The category group name for this mapping.

GenieTag.description: A tag applied to an outlet or merchant, indicating a specific attribute that applies to that entity.

GenieAreaLocation.description:
A reference to a geographic area rather than a specific address.
For example:
  - "New Zealand" (country)
  - "Waikato, New Zealand" (region)
  - "Auckland, New Zealand" (locality)
  - "Grey Lynn, Auckland, New Zealand" (sublocality)

GenieEstablishmentLocation.description: A reference to a specific physical establishment location.

address.description: The address fields in a structured format. This is available on almost all establishment-level locations, however it may occasionally be missing,

oneOf.description:
A reference to a geographic area rather than a specific address.
For example:
  - "New Zealand" (country)
  - "Waikato, New Zealand" (region)
  - "Auckland, New Zealand" (locality)
  - "Grey Lynn, Auckland, New Zealand" (sublocality)
A reference to a specific physical establishment location.

address.description: The address fields in a structured format. This is available on almost all establishment-level locations, however it may occasionally be missing,

GenieMerchant.description: A merchant match result from Genie.

logo.description: A URL referencing the merchant's logo. If no logo is available, a placeholder image is provided.

website.description: The URL for the merchant's website.

nzbn.description: The merchant's NZBN (New Zealand Business Number).

oneOf.description:
A reference to a geographic area rather than a specific address.
For example:
  - "New Zealand" (country)
  - "Waikato, New Zealand" (region)
  - "Auckland, New Zealand" (locality)
  - "Grey Lynn, Auckland, New Zealand" (sublocality)
A reference to a specific physical establishment location.

address.description: The address fields in a structured format. This is available on almost all establishment-level locations, however it may occasionally be missing,

tags.description: Tags that apply to the merchant. For example, to indicate that the merchant provides a subscription service.

items.description: A tag applied to an outlet or merchant, indicating a specific attribute that applies to that entity.

GenieOutlet.description: An individual outlet (i.e. specific location). An outlet will always be returned in combination with its related "parent" merchant.

name.description: The outlet name. This is usually more specific than the merchant name. For example, the merchant name may be "Pak'nSAVE", while the outlet name is "Pak'nSAVE Sylvia Park".

logo.description: A URL referencing the outlet's logo. This field will only be included if the logo for this outlet differs from the merchant's logo.

website.description: The URL for the outlet's website. This field will only be included if the website for this outlet differs from the merchant's website.

phone.description: The outlet's phone number. This field will only be included if the phone number for this outlet differs from the merchant's phone number.

nzbn.description: The outlet's NZBN (New Zealand Business Number). This field will only be included if the NZBN for this outlet differs from the merchant's NZBN.

oneOf.description:
A reference to a geographic area rather than a specific address.
For example:
  - "New Zealand" (country)
  - "Waikato, New Zealand" (region)
  - "Auckland, New Zealand" (locality)
  - "Grey Lynn, Auckland, New Zealand" (sublocality)
A reference to a specific physical establishment location.

address.description: The address fields in a structured format. This is available on almost all establishment-level locations, however it may occasionally be missing,

tags.description: Tags that apply to the outlet. For example, to indicate that the outlet provides a subscription service. Tags are inherited (and potentially extended) from the outlet's "parent" merchant.

items.description: A tag applied to an outlet or merchant, indicating a specific attribute that applies to that entity.

id.description: A unique correlation id for the query to help you to find the corresponding result in the response data.

description.description: The transaction description. This should be the full description as provided by the bank / transaction source.

_connection.description:
The Akahu connection ID corresponding to the bank from which the transaction description was sourced. It is strongly recommended to include this parameter to ensure best results.

The following connection IDs are available:
  - ANZ: `conn_cjgaawozb000001nyd111xixr`
  - ASB: `conn_cjgaaqcna000001ldwof8tvj0`
  - BNZ: `conn_cjgaatd57000001pe1t1z0iy9`
  - Heartland: `conn_ck5rhsdbv0000ftx1bmdu9zas`
  - Kiwibank: `conn_cjgaac5at000001qi2yw8ftil`
  - Rabobank: `conn_ckydkmy3r000009mde2sx2i4d`
  - The Cooperative Bank: `conn_cjgab1c8e000001pmyxrkhova`
  - TSB: `conn_cjgab6fis000001qsytf1semy`
  - Westpac: `conn_cjgaaozdo000001mrnqmkl1m0`

amount.description: Transaction amount (+ for credit, - for debit).

direction.description: Whether the transaction is a debit or credit

id.description: The correlation ID for the query (if you provided one).

query.description: The original query description as provided.

results.description: The enrichment result for this query. Will contain 1 item if enrichment is successful, otherwise the array will be empty.

confidence.description: A value between 0 and 0.99 (inclusive) indicating the strength of the matched result (currently the lowest returned confidence score is 0.5).

category.description: The category assigned to this query by Genie enrichment.

_id.description: The [NZFCC](https://nzfcc.org) category code for the transaction

name.description: The name of the NZFCC category for this transaction

groups.description: A dictionary of category groups, keyed by category mapping name, for the NZFCC base category.

_id.description: The category group ID for this mapping.

name.description: The category group name for this mapping.

merchant.description: The merchant assigned to this query by Genie enrichment.

logo.description: A URL referencing the merchant's logo. If no logo is available, a placeholder image is provided.

website.description: The URL for the merchant's website.

nzbn.description: The merchant's NZBN (New Zealand Business Number).

oneOf.description:
A reference to a geographic area rather than a specific address.
For example:
  - "New Zealand" (country)
  - "Waikato, New Zealand" (region)
  - "Auckland, New Zealand" (locality)
  - "Grey Lynn, Auckland, New Zealand" (sublocality)
A reference to a specific physical establishment location.

address.description: The address fields in a structured format. This is available on almost all establishment-level locations, however it may occasionally be missing,

tags.description: Tags that apply to the merchant. For example, to indicate that the merchant provides a subscription service.

items.description: A tag applied to an outlet or merchant, indicating a specific attribute that applies to that entity.

outlet.description:
The specific outlet assigned to this query by Genie enrichment.
This field is only included in the result when a distinct outlet has been identified. For example, "Pak'nSAVE Mount Albert".
An outlet result will not be included for single-location merchants (e.g. your local dairy).
An outlet result will always be accompanied with a "parent" merchant.

name.description: The outlet name. This is usually more specific than the merchant name. For example, the merchant name may be "Pak'nSAVE", while the outlet name is "Pak'nSAVE Sylvia Park".

logo.description: A URL referencing the outlet's logo. This field will only be included if the logo for this outlet differs from the merchant's logo.

website.description: The URL for the outlet's website. This field will only be included if the website for this outlet differs from the merchant's website.

phone.description: The outlet's phone number. This field will only be included if the phone number for this outlet differs from the merchant's phone number.

nzbn.description: The outlet's NZBN (New Zealand Business Number). This field will only be included if the NZBN for this outlet differs from the merchant's NZBN.

A reference to a geographic area rather than a specific address.
For example:
  - "New Zealand" (country)
  - "Waikato, New Zealand" (region)
  - "Auckland, New Zealand" (locality)
  - "Grey Lynn, Auckland, New Zealand" (sublocality)
A reference to a specific physical establishment location.
